name: BinnyBot
description:
Welcome to Binny's world!

Look inside the virtual world where robots, controlled by their own artificial brain system, explore and learn from their reality!

You are the blue avatar, who can roam around and check out the robots' activity.

Controls:

'W' - Forward    (hold down 'Shift' to Run)

'S' - Back up

'A' - Left,    'D' - Right

(Use the mouse to orient yourself to the surrounding scene)

'E' -- Pick up objects/robots

'C' -- Change Camera location

'Z' -- Reset the Scene

Note: use First-person view (toggle with 'C') and use the white center dot to aim on individual objects. Select with 'E'.
